channel.title: [317 PI] attacking Npcs from different spots
channel.description:
So i recently added kalphite queen to my server and the problem i can't fix atm is making it so it can be attacked from all directions (like in real rs)
theres only two spots (at the front of the queen) where it can be attacked.. any suggesions?
[IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg77/smallkid176/picproof.png[/img]
these are only attack spots... if i try to attack from behind it just runs to one of these.
